name: Three Pillars of Pizza
description:
Tested and developed for Oculus Quest 2

The Three Pillars of Pizza is a response to the VR Game Jam with the theme: "One Time Use". And here I have explored that through the Pizza Tripod.

You are taken on a short history of pizza creation within this narrative world, before finding yourself at the end of the pizza production line. You must install the Pizza Tripods on every pizza that comes your way without missing any! Your Robot supervisor is watching closely to ensure you keep on track!

See everyone's scores come in live here on Google Sheet

This is my first game jam, I have some experience with VR games but wanted to challenge myself with this the last week during weekends and evenings. I worked alone as didn't know how much time I could commit, but I brought in some outside help for illustration and voiceover.
